artefact.overview: You need a certificate of registration from Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA) if you keep or use radioactive material
artefact.will_continue_on: the Scottish Environment Protection Agency website
artefact.licence_short_description: You need a certificate of registration from Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA) if you keep or use radioactive material.
artefact.licence_overview:
To keep or use radioactive material at premises you need a certificate of registration from the [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)"){:rel="external"}

Application forms can be accessed via the SEPA website.
